评论概述: Get them!! I wear size 12, got the L, but they make you sweat!
评论详情: I ordered L and XL but for some reason, the L was MUCH looser… and I promise I double checked the labels! So keep in mind that there does appear to be some sizing discrepancies. They are very stretchy, but tight, so inch them on like pantyhose. The waist comes just below my belly button and they rest right above my ankles. Super cute! Just walking around my house I was sweating so buyer beware, these are toasty warm! For reference, I’m 5’4, 180 pounds, and usually wear 12/14 or 31/32 jeans.

I honestly love these. I’ve had a few faux leggings/pants before. I’ve gone to H&M, Express, etc. They are normally too expensive or they aren’t full faux leather throughout, sometimes a break in the butt or inner thighs. These are full faux leather with a thin fleece line inside to make it easier to get on. The stretch on these are ideal. I bought a Medium. I’m 140ish pounds and 5’2”. Most of that weight is in my butt and thighs. These fit like a glove for me. Maybe had to re-adjust once throughout the night but I was also hosting an event for 300 people. I’ve worn them 3 times now and have gone through the wash, they’ve held up. If something changes in the next few months I will update. I’m sure they will last a decent amount of time but I doubt these will be pants I keep for 6+ years.
Love love product

I have not yet worn these out, but will give you the following:  I read the reviews and was rather hesitant to purchase them.  They were on sale, so I decided to do it.  I got the tan colored leggings.  I am wearing them around the house and have them on now.  I live in a cold climate.  They feel good, but not too warm.  Pretty lightweight, actually.  They seem to stay up well.  They feel good and look good.  I plan to wear them with my brown or black sweaters.  There is an odd smell -- but I think after airing out or giving a quick hand wash, even in Dawn, that will be fine.  They look great.  I am going to have fun with these.
